column1: Oh wah wah! Get over it, druggie.  Jeez...
Sorry, these are illegal.
Is that them?
Did you come across some kind of ship or something?
The symbology lines up to mirrored points in space. If Kyle Broflovski is right, then Plymouth Rock is some kind of wormhole.
We might have a problem.
We just got word somebody might try to Faith Hill this event.
Hello, Mr. Zimmerman. Your country needs you.
We...  need you to shoot a young African-American for us.
Then do it for your family!  This is about protecting people, Zimmerman! Keeping our streets safe so that our children are free to go out...
My God, I didn't even see him.
Nonsense, you did what you had to. You're a hero.
Gun!
Hello there little boy, we're looking for a starving African child who was accidentally sent here instead of a Teiko sports watch.
Here's your sports watch son, sorry for the mix-up.
Have you seen anyone fitting this description.
There you are. Are you ready to go home now?
...I did.
Yes. I'm Connelly, and this is Sphinx. We're with the CIA.
Freeze!
It's alright, we're with the government.
Freeze!! FBI!!
